article_title: Walgreen, UnitedHealth, Epic Form Carequality To Share Patient Data

article_metadata.author: Zina Moukheiber

og.description: How many organizations do we need to facilitate the electronic transfer of patient information from one health care provider to another? A few, it seems. Healtheway, an organization which grew out of a government effort to enable health information exchange, launched Carequality. Its mission: to accelerate the sharing of patient data. Only [...]
